title: We're engaged!
html:
The following is the text of an overlay box I've stuck on my site today, which should only appear for you once and only within the next day or two:

Please excuse this interruption in your regularly scheduled surfing.

Last night, in front of the Max & Erma's restaurant where we had our first date, I dropped to one knee, presented Miss Alexandra Asher Arnold with a ring, and asked her to marry me.

And, you know what...?

SHE SAID YES!

I am now the luckiest nerd in the universe.

I love you, Alexandra!

If you'd happen to like to see the box again while I've still got it on the site:
Click here to clear the shiny cookie.

Archived Comments

  • Dougal Campbell
    2005-06-17T11:50:56
    Congrats! She *does* know what she's getting into, right? :)
  • l.m. orchard
    2005-06-17T11:58:48
    Oddly enough, I think I've more than met my match. :) Here's an old LiveJournal post of mine, if it's any indication: http://www.livejournal.com/~deus_x/91013.html
  • Buzz Andersen
    2005-06-17T12:14:52
    Ah--congratulations!
  • Jason Clark
    2005-06-17T12:39:50
    Les, Alexandra - Congratulations, and Best Wishes!
  • eoliTH
    2005-06-17T12:41:58
    Congratulations from Madrid, Spain!! Love's cool! :-) I love you Miriam!
  • Simon Willison
    2005-06-17T12:48:29
    Did she have the old BBS files on a disk somewhere then? (From a comment on that LiveJournal post: "Dude. The last of a dying breed. Snag her quick. And if she has all her old bbs text files still on a disk somewhere... MARRY HER. ;D") Congratulations!
  • Dorothea Salo
    2005-06-17T12:49:07
    Ah, nerd love. It's so geekily sweet. Congratulations, you two, and may you be very happy together.
  • Bill
    2005-06-17T12:49:24
    Congratulations!
  • jcwinnie
    2005-06-17T12:55:06
    You and whathisface, you know, the less handsome, movie actor... Anyway, congratulations! P.S. See where love can get ya!
  • Mike McBride
    2005-06-17T13:06:23
    Congrats! I wish you both the best!
  • Geof F. Morris
    2005-06-17T13:09:54
    Congratulations! :)
  • Dan Dickinson
    2005-06-17T13:54:30
    Congrats to the both of you! :)
  • Henning Koch
    2005-06-17T14:19:54
    Congratulations! And don't fuck it up :)
  • Basil Crow
    2005-06-17T14:45:55
    Toldja geeks rule! Congratulations to you both.
  • Dougal
    2005-06-17T15:11:12
    Ah, so she *does* know what she's getting into! Awesome :) Just to beat my own geeky chest a bit, back in college I started to write my own BBS system. On my Radio Shack Color Computer (1MHz 6809, 64K of RAM). With floppy disks (2 double-sided 5-1/4" 80-track drives, no HD). And a manually operated 300baud modem (I hacked auto-answer by running the ring signal to a joystick port). And I was basically writing my own customized file system to implement a fixed-size message queue that would automatically drop out the oldest messages. In BASIC. I was probably about 80% done before some other project distracted me from finishing it :)
  • Edward Vielmetti
    2005-06-17T15:18:54
    Congratulations Les! Ed
  • Roger Benningfield
    2005-06-17T15:26:23
    Congrats to both of you.
  • Shelley
    2005-06-17T16:14:21
    I'll refrain from humming the Queen song under my breath while I send you both my felicitations and hopes for a long, happy, and, most importantly, fun life together.
  • Jed
    2005-06-17T17:52:17
    Congratulations!
  • Cyndy
    2005-06-17T18:14:10
    Congrats!
  • Brian
    2005-06-17T18:35:02
    Rock on!
  • Aristotle Pagaltzis
    2005-06-17T18:37:42
    Congratulations. :) May your union be successful and lasting.
  • Lorenzo
    2005-06-17T19:48:21
    Congratulations! Well, I was just surfing in search of blosxom plugins, but when I saw the text box I couldn't help but smile :) But that's probably because I'm in love, too. (¡Te quiero, Pili!) Greetings from Spain ;)
  • ffg
    2005-06-18T09:00:41
    Les, congratulations! I'm so happy for you. :)
  • Don Park
    2005-06-20T00:07:45
    Congratz! I don't quite remember how I proposed (definitely no kneeling) but I now regret having done more...cuz she bugs me about it still.
  • AJ
    2005-06-20T08:56:42
    Congratulations! As a newlywed myself (today is our two day anniversary), I can say from experience that being married is awesome to the max. Best wishes for a happy and healthy life together.
  • Pete Prodoehl
    2005-06-20T14:13:21
    Hooray for you guys! All the best...
  • Sunir
    2005-06-20T17:20:56
    Congratulations!
  • Nick Shue
    2005-06-21T00:47:19
    Congrats old man! Wish you both the best!!!
  • Lee
    2005-06-21T16:06:43
    Congratulations! That's the first engagement announcement I've ever seen via RSS... and there I was thinking the day was out of suprises. :-)
  • jcwinnie
    2005-06-24T07:49:57
    First comes love, then comes marriage, then comes Les pushing the little geeks to code in Python. "But, Dadddddd, Python is so... old-fashioned." (grin)
